help-file.title: "CALL LIGHTNING"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Electric
This spell causes a massive bolt of lightning to hurl itself from the rain clouds overhead, striking the intended victim and causing considerable damage. Storm Giants innately possess a stronger version of the Druid spell. NOTE: Both the innate and the spell must be cast outdoors in order to work.
